pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Score Testing in GLMs, by Sign-Flip Contributions // Provides robust tests for testing in GLMs, by sign-flipping score contributions. The tests are robust against overdispersion, heteroscedasticity and, in some cases, ignored nuisance variables. See Hemerik, Goeman and Finos (2020) doi:10.1111/rssb.12369.
